sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO w_consulting_history_master ( consulting_history_no, manager, consulting_type, tel_type , registration_date, received_type, contact_tel_no, consulting_req_type , contact_method_type, contact_method_type_etc, client_name, client_gender , client_belong, client_victim_rel_type, client_victim_rel_type_etc, victim_name , victim_gender_type, victim_belong, offender_name, offender_gender_type , offender_belong, offender_victim_rel_type, offender_victim_rel_type_etc, harm_first_type_rape , harm_first_type_harass, harm_first_type_verbal, harm_first_type_visual, harm_first_type_etc , harm_sec_type, harm_sec_type_security, harm_sec_type_seprate, harm_sec_type_intention , harm_sec_type_identity, harm_sec_etc, harm_sec_etc_txt, harm_etc , harm_etc_txt, harm_first_type_sexism, harm_first_type_unknown, harm_first_type_none , response_type_info, response_type_advice, response_type_intro_org, response_type_intro_org_women , response_type_intro_org_labor, response_type_intro_org_police, response_type_intro_org_education, response_type_intro_org_human , response_type_intro_org_etc, response_type_intro_org_etc_txt, response_type_service_rel, response_type_service_rel_con , response_type_service_rel_law, response_type_service_rel_medical, response_type_service_rel_etc, response_type_etc , response_type_etc_txt, consulting_contents, consulting_contents_etc, boardno , action_history_no, press_group_no, create_user, create_date , response_type_service_rel_etc_txt, consulting_start_date, consulting_end_date ) VALUES ( FN_CONSULTING_NO(), #manager#, #consulting_type#, #tel_type# , NOW(), #received_type#, #contact_tel_no#, #consulting_req_type# , #contact_method_type#, #contact_method_type_etc#, #client_name#, #client_gender# , #client_belong#, #client_victim_rel_type#, #client_victim_rel_type_etc#, #victim_name# , #victim_gender_type#, #victim_belong#, #offender_name#, #offender_gender_type# , #offender_belong#, #offender_victim_rel_type#, #offender_victim_rel_type_etc#, #harm_first_type_rape# , #harm_first_type_harass#, #harm_first_type_verbal#, #harm_first_type_visual#, #harm_first_type_etc# , #harm_sec_type#, #harm_sec_type_security#, #harm_sec_type_seprate#, #harm_sec_type_intention# , #harm_sec_type_identity#, #harm_sec_etc#, #harm_sec_etc_txt#, #harm_etc# , #harm_etc_txt#, #harm_first_type_sexism#, #harm_first_type_unknown#, #harm_first_type_none# , #response_type_info#, #response_type_advice#, #response_type_intro_org#, #response_type_intro_org_women# , #response_type_intro_org_labor#, #response_type_intro_org_police#, #response_type_intro_org_education#, #response_type_intro_org_human# , #response_type_intro_org_etc#, #response_type_intro_org_etc_txt#, #response_type_service_rel#, #response_type_service_rel_con# , #response_type_service_rel_law#, #response_type_service_rel_medical#, #response_type_service_rel_etc#, #response_type_etc# , #response_type_etc_txt#, #consulting_contents#, #consulting_contents_etc#, #boardno# , #action_history_no#, #press_group_no#, #create_user#, NOW() , #response_type_service_rel_etc_txt#, #consulting_start_date#, #consulting_end_date# )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.select: SELECT NO ,consulting_history_no ,manager ,consulting_type ,tel_type , registration_date ,received_type ,contact_tel_no ,consulting_req_type ,contact_method_type , contact_method_type_etc ,client_name ,client_gender ,client_belong ,client_victim_rel_type , client_victim_rel_type_etc ,victim_name ,victim_gender_type ,victim_belong ,offender_name , offender_gender_type ,offender_belong ,offender_victim_rel_type ,offender_victim_rel_type_etc ,harm_first_type_rape , harm_first_type_harass ,harm_first_type_verbal ,harm_first_type_visual ,harm_first_type_etc ,harm_sec_type , harm_sec_type_security ,harm_sec_type_seprate ,harm_sec_type_intention ,harm_sec_type_identity ,harm_sec_etc, harm_sec_etc_txt , harm_etc ,harm_etc_txt ,harm_first_type_sexism ,harm_first_type_unknown ,harm_first_type_none , response_type_info ,response_type_advice ,response_type_intro_org ,response_type_intro_org_women ,response_type_intro_org_labor , response_type_intro_org_police ,response_type_intro_org_education ,response_type_intro_org_human ,response_type_intro_org_etc ,response_type_intro_org_etc_txt , response_type_service_rel ,response_type_service_rel_con ,response_type_service_rel_law ,response_type_service_rel_medical ,response_type_service_rel_etc , response_type_etc ,response_type_etc_txt ,consulting_contents ,consulting_contents_etc ,boardno , action_history_no ,press_group_no ,delete_reason ,create_user ,create_date , update_user ,update_date ,delete_user ,delete_date ,delete_yn , response_type_service_rel_etc_txt ,consulting_start_date ,consulting_end_date FROM w_consulting_history_master WHERE NO = #NO# AND delete_yn = 'N'

sql.isNotEmpty: AND a.consulting_history_no IN ( SELECT consulting_action_no FROM w_consulting_action_rel_managesr WHERE manager IN ( SELECT USERID FROM ZUSER WHERE USERNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#manager_name#,'%') ) AND con_ac_type = 'con' )

isNotEmpty.isNotEmpty: AND ( registration_date between STR_TO_DATE(#registration_date_from#,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(#registration_date_to#,'%Y-%m-%d'), interval +1 DAY) )
AND ( consulting_start_date between STR_TO_DATE(#consulting_start_date_from#,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(#consulting_start_date_to#,'%Y-%m-%d'), interval +1 DAY) )
AND ( consulting_end_date between STR_TO_DATE(#consulting_end_date_from#, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_ADD(#consulting_end_date_to#,interval +1 DAY) )

sqlMap.select:
SELECT count(*) AS total FROM w_consulting_history_master a WHERE a.DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND a.consulting_history_no IN ( SELECT consulting_action_no FROM w_consulting_action_rel_managesr WHERE manager = #loginUserId# AND con_ac_type = 'con' )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT row_.*, @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rownum_ FROM ( SELECT NO ,consulting_history_no ,manager ,consulting_type ,tel_type , registration_date ,received_type ,contact_tel_no ,consulting_req_type ,contact_method_type , contact_method_type_etc ,client_name ,client_gender ,client_belong ,client_victim_rel_type , client_victim_rel_type_etc ,victim_name ,victim_gender_type ,victim_belong ,offender_name , offender_gender_type ,offender_belong ,offender_victim_rel_type ,offender_victim_rel_type_etc ,harm_first_type_rape , harm_first_type_harass ,harm_first_type_verbal ,harm_first_type_visual ,harm_first_type_etc ,harm_sec_type , harm_sec_type_security ,harm_sec_type_seprate ,harm_sec_type_intention ,harm_sec_type_identity ,harm_sec_etc, harm_sec_etc_txt , harm_etc ,harm_etc_txt ,harm_first_type_sexism ,harm_first_type_unknown ,harm_first_type_none , response_type_info ,response_type_advice ,response_type_intro_org ,response_type_intro_org_women ,response_type_intro_org_labor , response_type_intro_org_police ,response_type_intro_org_education ,response_type_intro_org_human ,response_type_intro_org_etc ,response_type_intro_org_etc_txt , response_type_service_rel ,response_type_service_rel_con ,response_type_service_rel_law ,response_type_service_rel_medical ,response_type_service_rel_etc , response_type_etc ,response_type_etc_txt ,consulting_contents ,consulting_contents_etc , action_history_no ,delete_reason ,create_user ,create_date , update_user ,update_date ,delete_user ,delete_date ,delete_yn , ( CASE WHEN ccnt > 1 THEN concat(b.username,'외 ',ccnt-1,'인 ') ELSE b.username END ) AS manager_name , response_type_service_rel_etc_txt ,consulting_start_date ,consulting_end_date , CASE WHEN consulting_type = 'public' THEN '공공부문' WHEN consulting_type = 'civil' THEN '민간부문' WHEN consulting_type = 'personal' THEN '개인간' WHEN consulting_type = 'etc' THEN '기타/미파악' ELSE '' END AS consulting_type_txt , CASE WHEN received_type = 'tel' THEN '전화' WHEN received_type = 'mail' THEN '우편' WHEN received_type = 'visit' THEN '내방' WHEN received_type = 'move' THEN '이관' ELSE '' END AS received_type_txt , CASE WHEN consulting_req_type = 'relaccident' THEN '사건관련' WHEN consulting_req_type = 'simple' THEN '단순문의' WHEN consulting_req_type = 'etc' THEN '기타' ELSE '' END AS consulting_req_type_txt , CASE WHEN contact_method_type = 'internet' THEN '인터넷 검색' WHEN contact_method_type = 'support' THEN '피해자 지원기관 등' WHEN contact_method_type = 'gov' THEN '여성가족부' WHEN contact_method_type = 'etc' THEN CONCAT('기타-',contact_method_type_etc) WHEN contact_method_type = 'unknown' THEN '미파악' ELSE '' END AS contact_method_type_txt , CASE WHEN client_gender = 'female' THEN '여성' WHEN client_gender = 'male' THEN '남성' WHEN client_gender = 'unknown' THEN '미상' ELSE '' END AS client_gender_txt , CASE WHEN client_victim_rel_type = 'me' THEN '본인' WHEN client_victim_rel_type = 'agent' THEN '대리인/조력자' WHEN client_victim_rel_type = 'relmanager' THEN '관련 담당자' WHEN client_victim_rel_type = 'doer' THEN '행위자등' WHEN client_victim_rel_type = 'etc' THEN CONCAT('기타-',client_victim_rel_type_etc) ELSE '' END AS client_victim_rel_type_txt , CASE WHEN victim_gender_type = 'female' THEN '여성' WHEN victim_gender_type = 'male' THEN '남성' WHEN victim_gender_type = 'unknown' THEN '미상' WHEN victim_gender_type = 'none' THEN '해당사항없음' ELSE '' END AS victim_gender_type_txt , CASE WHEN offender_gender_type = 'female' THEN '여성' WHEN offender_gender_type = 'male' THEN '남성' WHEN offender_gender_type = 'unknown' THEN '미상' WHEN offender_gender_type = 'none' THEN '해당사항없음' ELSE '' END AS offender_gender_type_txt , CASE WHEN offender_victim_rel_type = 'boss' THEN '기관장/사업주' WHEN offender_victim_rel_type = 'senior' THEN '상급자' WHEN offender_victim_rel_type = 'partner' THEN '동료' WHEN offender_victim_rel_type = 'otherrel' THEN '그 외 업무관계자' WHEN offender_victim_rel_type = 'etc' THEN CONCAT('기타-',offender_victim_rel_type_etc) WHEN offender_victim_rel_type = 'unknown' THEN '미파악' ELSE '' END AS offender_victim_rel_type_txt , CONCAT(CASE WHEN harm_first_type_rape = 'Y' THEN '강간/유사강간,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN harm_first_type_harass = 'Y' THEN '그 외 추행,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN harm_first_type_verbal = 'Y' THEN '언어적,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN harm_first_type_visual = 'Y' THEN '시각적,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN harm_first_type_etc = 'Y' THEN '기타 성희롱,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN harm_sec_type = 'Y' THEN '2차피해-' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN harm_sec_type_security = 'Y' THEN '비밀누설/소문유포,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN harm_sec_type_seprate = 'Y' THEN '분리조치 미흡,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN harm_sec_type_intention = 'Y' THEN '의사에 반한 사건처리,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN harm_sec_type_identity = 'Y' THEN '신분상 불이익,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN harm_sec_etc = 'Y' THEN CONCAT('그외-',harm_sec_etc_txt,',') ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN harm_etc = 'Y' THEN CONCAT('기타-',harm_etc_txt,',') ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN harm_first_type_sexism = 'Y' THEN '성차별,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN harm_first_type_unknown = 'Y' THEN '미파악,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN harm_first_type_none = 'Y' THEN '해당사항없음,' ELSE '' END) AS harm_first_type_txt , CONCAT(CASE WHEN response_type_info = 'Y' THEN '절차 안내 및 정보 제공,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN response_type_advice = 'Y' THEN '소속기관 상담/신고 권유,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN response_type_intro_org = 'Y' THEN '타 신고기관 안내-' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN response_type_intro_org_women = 'Y' THEN '여성가족부,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN response_type_intro_org_labor = 'Y' THEN '고용노동부,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN response_type_intro_org_police = 'Y' THEN '경찰,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN response_type_intro_org_education = 'Y' THEN '교육부,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN response_type_intro_org_human = 'Y' THEN '국가인권위원회,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN response_type_intro_org_etc = 'Y' THEN CONCAT('기타-',response_type_intro_org_etc_txt,',') ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN response_type_service_rel = 'Y' THEN '서비스 연계-' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN response_type_service_rel_con = 'Y' THEN '상담,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN response_type_service_rel_law = 'Y' THEN '법률/노무,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN response_type_service_rel_medical = 'Y' THEN '의료,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN response_type_service_rel_etc = 'Y' THEN CONCAT('그외-',response_type_service_rel_etc_txt,',') ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN response_type_etc = 'Y' THEN CONCAT('그외-',response_type_etc_txt,',') ELSE '' END) AS response_type_txt , CONCAT(CASE WHEN response_type_service_rel_con = 'Y' THEN '상담,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN response_type_service_rel_law = 'Y' THEN '법률/노무,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN response_type_service_rel_medical = 'Y' THEN '의료,' ELSE '' END) AS response_type_service_txt FROM w_consulting_history_master a JOIN zuser b on a.manager = b.userid LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT consulting_action_no, COUNT(*) AS ccnt FROM w_consulting_action_rel_managesr GROUP BY consulting_action_no ) C ON A.consulting_history_no = C.consulting_action_no , (SELECT @rownum := #m#) R WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND a.consulting_history_no IN ( SELECT consulting_action_no FROM w_consulting_action_rel_managesr WHERE manager = #loginUserId# AND con_ac_type = 'con' )
order by consulting_start_date desc LIMIT #m#, #n# ) row_ WHERE @rownum < (#n#+#m#) ) c
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE w_consulting_history_master SET DELETE_YN = 'Q' , DELETE_USER = #delete_user# , DELETE_DATE = NOW()
delete_reason = #delete_reason#
WHERE NO IN
#delList[]#

UPDATE w_consulting_history_master SET manager=#manager# ,consulting_type=#consulting_type# ,tel_type=#tel_type# , received_type=#received_type# ,contact_tel_no=#contact_tel_no# ,consulting_req_type=#consulting_req_type# ,contact_method_type=#contact_method_type# , contact_method_type_etc=#contact_method_type_etc# ,client_name=#client_name# ,client_gender=#client_gender# ,client_belong=#client_belong# , client_victim_rel_type=#client_victim_rel_type# ,client_victim_rel_type_etc=#client_victim_rel_type_etc# ,victim_name=#victim_name# ,victim_gender_type=#victim_gender_type# , victim_belong=#victim_belong# ,offender_name=#offender_name# ,offender_gender_type=#offender_gender_type# ,offender_belong=#offender_belong# , offender_victim_rel_type=#offender_victim_rel_type# ,offender_victim_rel_type_etc=#offender_victim_rel_type_etc# ,harm_first_type_rape=#harm_first_type_rape# ,harm_first_type_harass=#harm_first_type_harass# , harm_first_type_verbal=#harm_first_type_verbal# ,harm_first_type_visual=#harm_first_type_visual# ,harm_first_type_etc=#harm_first_type_etc# ,harm_sec_type=#harm_sec_type# , harm_sec_type_security=#harm_sec_type_security# ,harm_sec_type_seprate=#harm_sec_type_seprate# ,harm_sec_type_intention=#harm_sec_type_intention# ,harm_sec_type_identity=#harm_sec_type_identity# , harm_sec_etc=#harm_sec_etc# ,harm_sec_etc_txt=#harm_sec_etc_txt# ,harm_etc=#harm_etc# ,harm_etc_txt=#harm_etc_txt# , harm_first_type_sexism=#harm_first_type_sexism# ,harm_first_type_unknown=#harm_first_type_unknown# ,harm_first_type_none=#harm_first_type_none# ,response_type_info=#response_type_info# , response_type_advice=#response_type_advice# ,response_type_intro_org=#response_type_intro_org# ,response_type_intro_org_women=#response_type_intro_org_women# ,response_type_intro_org_labor=#response_type_intro_org_labor# , response_type_intro_org_police=#response_type_intro_org_police# ,response_type_intro_org_education=#response_type_intro_org_education# ,response_type_intro_org_human=#response_type_intro_org_human# ,response_type_intro_org_etc=#response_type_intro_org_etc# , response_type_intro_org_etc_txt=#response_type_intro_org_etc_txt# ,response_type_service_rel=#response_type_service_rel# ,response_type_service_rel_con=#response_type_service_rel_con# ,response_type_service_rel_law=#response_type_service_rel_law# , response_type_service_rel_medical=#response_type_service_rel_medical# ,response_type_service_rel_etc=#response_type_service_rel_etc# ,response_type_etc=#response_type_etc# ,response_type_etc_txt=#response_type_etc_txt# , consulting_contents=#consulting_contents# ,consulting_contents_etc=#consulting_contents_etc#, boardno=#boardno# ,action_history_no=#action_history_no# ,press_group_no=#press_group_no# , delete_reason=#delete_reason# ,update_user=#update_user# ,update_date=NOW() , response_type_service_rel_etc_txt = #response_type_service_rel_etc_txt# ,consulting_start_date=#consulting_start_date# ,consulting_end_date=#consulting_end_date# WHERE NO=#NO# AND consulting_history_no = #consulting_history_no#
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM w_consulting_history_master WHERE consulting_history_no IN
#delList[]#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE w_consulting_history_master SET DELETE_YN = 'N' , update_user = #update_user# , update_date = NOW() WHERE consulting_history_no IN
#updList[]#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT count(*) AS total FROM w_consulting_history_master WHERE DELETE_YN = 'Q'
date_format($cond1$,'%Y%m%d') between #sdate# and #edate#
UPPER($cond2$) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#keyword#)||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT row_.*, @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rownum_ FROM ( SELECT NO ,consulting_history_no ,(SELECT username FROM zuser WHERE userid = manager ) as manager ,consulting_type ,tel_type ,registration_date ,received_type ,contact_tel_no ,case when consulting_req_type = 'simple' then '단순문의' when consulting_req_type = 'relaccident' then '사건관련' when consulting_req_type = 'etc' then '기타'
END as consulting_req_type ,contact_method_type ,contact_method_type_etc ,client_name ,client_gender ,client_belong ,client_victim_rel_type , client_victim_rel_type_etc ,victim_name ,victim_gender_type ,victim_belong ,offender_name , offender_gender_type ,offender_belong ,offender_victim_rel_type ,offender_victim_rel_type_etc ,harm_first_type_rape , harm_first_type_harass ,harm_first_type_verbal ,harm_first_type_visual ,harm_first_type_etc ,harm_sec_type , harm_sec_type_security ,harm_sec_type_seprate ,harm_sec_type_intention ,harm_sec_type_identity ,harm_sec_etc, harm_sec_etc_txt , harm_etc ,harm_etc_txt ,harm_first_type_sexism ,harm_first_type_unknown ,harm_first_type_none , response_type_info ,response_type_advice ,response_type_intro_org ,response_type_intro_org_women ,response_type_intro_org_labor , response_type_intro_org_police ,response_type_intro_org_education ,response_type_intro_org_human ,response_type_intro_org_etc ,response_type_intro_org_etc_txt , response_type_service_rel ,response_type_service_rel_con ,response_type_service_rel_law ,response_type_service_rel_medical ,response_type_service_rel_etc , response_type_etc ,response_type_etc_txt ,consulting_contents ,consulting_contents_etc ,boardno , action_history_no ,press_group_no ,delete_reason ,create_user ,create_date , update_user ,update_date ,delete_user ,delete_date ,delete_yn , response_type_service_rel_etc_txt ,consulting_start_date ,consulting_end_date FROM w_consulting_history_master a, (SELECT @rownum := #m#) R WHERE DELETE_YN = 'Q'
DATE_FORMAT($cond1$,'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #sdate# AND #edate#
UPPER($cond2$) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#keyword#),'%')
ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT #m#, #n# ) row_ WHERE @rownum < (#n#+#m#) ) c

SELECT count(*) AS total FROM w_consulting_history_master_old WHERE 1=1
date_format(counsel_date,'%Y%m%d') between #sdate# and #edate#
manager LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#keyword#),'%')
contact_tel_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#keyword#,'%')
consulting_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#keyword#,'%')
consulting_req_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#keyword#,'%')

SELECT counsel_month, counsel_date, counsel_starttime, counsel_endtime, NO, manager, received_type_tel, received_type_mail, received_type_visit, received_type_move, consulting_type, consulting_type_public, consulting_type_civil, consulting_type_personal, consulting_type_etc, tel_type, contact_tel_no, consulting_req_type, consulting_req_type_relaccident, consulting_req_type_simple, consulting_req_type_etc, client_name, client_gender_female, client_gender_male, client_gender_unknown, client_belong, client_victim_rel_type_me, client_victim_rel_type_agent, client_victim_rel_type_relmanager, client_victim_rel_type_doer, client_victim_rel_type_etc, client_victim_rel_type_etc_txt, victim_name, victim_gender_type_female, victim_gender_type_male, victim_gender_type_unknown, victim_gender_type_none, victim_belong, offender_name, offender_gender_type_female, offender_gender_type_male, offender_gender_type_unknown, offender_gender_type_none, offender_belong, offender_victim_rel_type_boss, offender_victim_rel_type_senior, offender_victim_rel_type_partner, offender_victim_rel_type_otherrel, offender_victim_rel_type_etc, offender_victim_rel_type_etc_txt, offender_victim_rel_type_unknown, harm_first_type_rape, harm_first_type_harass, harm_first_type_verbal, harm_first_type_visual, harm_first_type_etc, harm_sec_type, harm_sec_type_security, harm_sec_type_seprate, harm_sec_type_intention, harm_sec_type_identity, harm_sec_etc, harm_sec_etc_txt, harm_etc, harm_etc_txt, harm_first_type_sexism, harm_first_type_unknown, harm_first_type_none, response_type_info, response_type_advice, response_type_intro_org, response_type_intro_org_women, response_type_intro_org_labor, response_type_intro_org_police, response_type_intro_org_education, response_type_intro_org_human, response_type_intro_org_etc, response_type_intro_org_etc_txt, response_type_service_rel_1, response_type_service_rel_2, response_type_service_rel_3, response_type_service_rel_4, response_type_service_rel_5, response_type_etc, response_type_etc_txt, consulting_contents, consulting_contents_etc, contact_method_type_internet, contact_method_type_support, contact_method_type_gov, contact_method_type_etc, contact_method_type_etc_txt, contact_method_type_unknown, continue_consulting, add_call_time_1, add_call_time_2, time FROM w_consulting_history_master_old WHERE 1=1
date_format(counsel_date,'%Y%m%d') between #sdate# and #edate#
manager LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#keyword#),'%')
contact_tel_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#keyword#,'%')
consulting_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#keyword#,'%')
consulting_req_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#keyword#,'%')
order by NO desc LIMIT #m#, #n#
